name: Watch The Walls!
description:
Watch the Walls is a casual game where you have to avoid the wall and get to the portal. The game is currently early access, and there will be more stuff added almost every week until the game is completed. Thank you for playing!

Controls : WASD

Patch 3.0:

-Adds WASD controls, new level

Patch 4.0:

-Adds two more levels

-Fixes the ball texture

Patch 4.1:

-fixes the last level
